solution:
From the triple angle formulas, $\cos 3A = 4 \cos^3 A - 3 \cos A$ and $\sin 3A = 3 \sin A - 4 \sin^3 A,$ so
\begin{align*}
\frac{\sin^2 3A}{\sin^2 A} - \frac{\cos^2 3A}{\cos^2 A} &= (3 - 4 \sin^2 A)^2 - (4 \cos^2 A - 3)^2 \\
&= (3 - 4(1 - \cos^2 A))^2 - (4 \cos^2 A - 3)^2 \\
&= (4 \cos^2 A - 1)^2 - (4 \cos^2 A - 3)^2 \\
&= [(4 \cos^2 A - 1) + (4 \cos^2 A - 3)][(4 \cos^2 A - 1) - (4 \cos^2 A - 3)] \\
&= (8 \cos^2 A - 4)(2) \\
&= 16 \cos^2 A - 8 = 2.
\end{align*}Then $\cos^2 A = \frac{10}{16} = \frac{5}{8},$ so
\[\cos 2A = 2 \cos^2 A - 1 = 2 \cdot \frac{5}{8} - 1 = \boxed{\frac{1}{4}}.\]

Step 1: Multiply both sides of the given equation by $\sin^2A\cos^2A$ to clear the denominators and obtain
\[\sin^2 3A\cos^2 A - \cos^2 3A\sin^2 A=2\sin^2A\cos^2A.\]
Step 2: 
\[\sin^2 3A\cos^2 A - \cos^2 3A\sin^2 A=2\sin^2A\cos^2A,\]
\[\sin^2 3A\cos^2 A - \cos^2 3A\sin^2 A = 2\sin^2 A\cos^2 A,\]
\[\sin 3A\cos 3A\sin A\cos A = 2\sin^2 A\cos^2 A,\]
\[\sin 3A\cos 3A\sin A\cos A = 4\sin^2 A\cos^2 A.\]
\[\sin 3A\cos 3A\sin A\cos A = 4\sin^2 A\cos^2 A,\]
\[\left(\frac{1}{2}\sin 6A\right)\sin A\cos A = 4\sin^2 A\cos^2 A,\]
\[\frac{1}{2}\sin A\cos A\sin 6A = 4\sin^2 A\cos^2 A.\]
\[\frac{1}{2}\sin A\cos A\sin 6A = 4\sin^2 A\cos^2 A,\]
\[2\sin A\cos A\sin 6A = 8\sin^2 A\cos^2 A,\]
\[2\sin A\cos A\sin 6A = 8\sin^2 A\cos^2 A,\]
\[\sin 6A = 4\sin A\cos A\]
\[\sin 6A = 4\sin A\cos A,\]
\[\sin 6A = 2\cdot 2\sin A\cos A,\]
\[\sin 6A = 2\cdot 2\sin A\cos A,\]
\[2\sin 3A\cos 3A = 2\cdot 2\sin A\cos A,\]

\[\sin 6A = 4\sin A
